hero.desc: Stop wasting time on complex interfaces. Manage Users, Groups, and OUs in just 3 clicks. Secure, Fast, and Docker-Ready.

mission.title: Why S-RCS?
mission.desc: Traditional AD management is slow, complex, and error-prone. S-RCS simplifies administration into a modern web interface without sacrificing security.

time.title: Save Time
time.desc: Streamlined workflows replace endless navigation. Perform complex tasks in seconds.

security.title: Secure by Design
security.desc: Uses LDAPS (SSL) on Port 636. No passwords stored in plain text. Full audit logging.

access.title: Access Anywhere
access.desc: Web-based portal. Manage your server from any device. Supports NovusGate VPN.

footer.tagline:
Server Reporting and Controlling System.
The future of AD management.

gallery.title: See S-RCS in Action
gallery.subtitle: Modern, intuitive, and designed for efficiency.
gallery.source: Images fetched live from GitHub Repository.
gallery.fetch_error: Failed to load images from GitHub.

install.title: Deployment in Seconds
install.desc: With Docker, you can have the full system running in under 2 minutes. No complex wizardry required.

global_section.title: Supported Languages
global_section.desc: S-RCS is fully multilingual, allowing administration in your preferred language.

comparison.title: S-RCS vs Competitors
comparison.desc: See how S-RCS compares to traditional and enterprise AD management solutions.
comparison.disclaimer: ManageEngine and Adaxes are registered trademarks. Prices are approximate and subject to change.

header.title: Professional Support
header.subtitle: Get expert help directly from the creator of S-RCS.

professional.desc: Detailed installation, configuration, and training services provided exclusively by Ali Zeynalli.

services_breakdown.title: Service Breakdown
services_breakdown.subtitle: Comprehensive professional services to ensure your success.

installation.title: Full Installation
installation.desc: Complete installation of S-RCS in your infrastructure, ensuring best practices.

config.title: AD Configuration
config.desc: Setup of Certificate Services, LDAPS, and Firewall configuration for secure access.

support.title: Technical Support
support.desc: Priority problem resolution, troubleshooting, and ongoing maintenance.

training.title: Team Training
training.desc: Comprehensive training sessions to help your team master S-RCS.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.desc: Reach out directly for consultation and service inquiries.

header.title: Platform Overview
header.desc: Explore all 10 core modules of the S-RCS management platform.

login.title: Secure Login
login.desc: Secure entry point to your management console. Modern design with robust authentication via LDAPS encryption.

dashboard.title: Interactive Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Get a bird's-eye view. Monitor Helpdesk tickets, Password status, System Health, and Active Directory stats (Users, Groups, Computers) in real-time.

users.title: User Management
users.desc: Streamlined user lifecycle management. Create users, reset passwords, unlock accounts, and manage properties effortlessly.

ous.title: OU Management
ous.desc: Manage Organization Units with a hierarchical tree or table view. Create, edit, and move objects between OUs using intuitive modal interfaces.

groups.title: Group Management
groups.desc: Create and manage Security and Distribution groups. Easily add or remove members and organize groups within your structure.

computers.title: Computers
computers.desc: View and manage all domain-connected workstations and servers. Monitor AD status (enabled/disabled) and manage computer objects efficiently.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.desc: Integrated Helpdesk & Ticketing system. Streamline support by creating tickets, assigning priorities, tracking status, and maintaining full audit trails.

reports.title: Advanced Reporting
reports.desc: Generate comprehensive reports for Users, Groups, Computers, and OUs. Export data to CSV or Excel formats for further analysis and compliance.

logs.title: Activity Logs
logs.desc: Comprehensive audit trail of system actions. Search and filter logs by date to track exactly who did what, ensuring maximum security and accountability.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.desc: Configure global system preferences. Manage LDAPS connections, Domain Controllers, and Role-Based Access Control via Admin and Allowed Groups.

cta.title: Experience S-RCS Today
cta.desc: Deploy in under 2 minutes with Docker. Free forever.

intro.title: Documentation Centre
intro.welcome: Welcome to the S-RCS documentation. S-RCS is a comprehensive web-based portal designed to revolutionize Windows Active Directory management, moving administration from traditional tools to a streamlined web platform.
intro.note: Note: This documentation is actively being enriched. Sections are being added and expanded regularly to provide a more comprehensive guide.
